WITH SYS REMAINING TU	RNED OFF PILOT SET DOWN LOAD OF LOGS & THEN RETURNED TO SERVICE LANDING MAKING UNEVENTFUL LDG. AFTER LDG PILOT CARRIED O	UT FULL HYDRAULIC SERVO CHECK & FOUND CYCLIC COULD NOT BE MOVED FWD WITH 1ST STAGE HYDRAULIC SYS ON. AIRCRAFT HAS BEEN OPERATED BY A 	SINGLE INDIVIDUAL WITH MINIMAL TAKEOFFS AND LANDING IN APPROXIMATELY FOUR MONTHS TIME.
